name: LiveWellYoga
0:
”Alexa, open live well yoga”
”Alexa, ask live well yoga tell me about pop up locations”
”Alexa, ask live well yoga to schedule a session”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: live well yoga
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Live Well Yoga is a traveling yoga business that brings yoga to you. Yoga offers numerous benefits, both physical and mental. Our goal is to spread more peace, love and kindness one yoga class at a time by providing fun, affordable and convenient yoga services.

Start talking to us by saying "Alexa, open Live Well Yoga". You can gather the following information from this skill:
- Why should you join Live Well Yoga
- The services of Live Well Yoga
- Benefits of yoga
- Schedule a session with Live Well Yoga
- Events that Live Well Yoga is going to
- The pop-up locations of Live Well Yoga
- Contact information of Live Well Yoga

Once you have started the skill, you can use the following voice commands to navigate through the skill:
- Alexa, tell me what's unique about Live Well Yoga
- Alexa, tell me about the services of Live Well Yoga
- Alexa, help me schedule a session with Live Well Yoga
- Alexa, tell me about the benefits of yoga
- Alexa, tell me about the events that Live Well Yoga is going to
- Alexa, tell me about the pop-up locations of Live Well Yoga
- Alexa, get me the contact information of Live Well Yoga

You could also directly say things like "Alexa, open Live Well Yoga and help me schedule a session" or "Alexa, open Live Well Yoga and tell me about the latest events".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
